Description:
Spacious home with dual living possibilities
Enjoying a wonderful northern orientation and flexible living possibilities, this substantial double fronted period home is sure to impress. The versatile layout offers either a single large family home or dual living possibilities with separate front & side entrances, accommodating blended families, ageing parents, adult children or rental income opportunities.
